article_title: Charter to D.C.: We’re No Comcast
article_text:
As top executives at Charter Communications Inc. and Time Warner Cable Inc. laid out their vision Tuesday for the cable companies’ planned merger, their pitch seemed aimed as much at Washington as at Wall Street.

Charter Chief Executive Tom Rutledge, speaking on a conference call after the company announced a $55 billion agreement to acquire Time Warner Cable, pledged to invest in new broadband products and refrain from the sorts of...
